eventsFunctions.fullName: Play a random sound on a channel
eventsFunctions.name: PlayRandomSoundOnChannel
eventsFunctions.sentence: Play the sound _PARAM1_._PARAM2_ with 1 of _PARAM3_ random variations on the channel _PARAM4_, vol.: _PARAM5_, pitch: _PARAM6_, loop: _PARAM7_

eventsFunctions.name: SetSpeed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Add to _PARAM0_ a permanent force in its heading direction
